description: Introduce the kids to Japanese flavours with bite-sized sushi balls. These fun, colourful balls are nutritionally approved and great for snacking on.
keywords: Finger food,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,Sesame free,Jul 2021,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Japanese Rice Balls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 nori sheets, halved, very thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine rice, seasoning, carrot and zucchini in a bowl. Place nori sheets on a plate.
Using damp hands, roll heaped tablespoonfuls of rice mixture into 16 balls. Roll balls in nori to lightly coat. Place on a large plate. Cover and refrigerate for 3 hours or until firm. Serve.
